# RMT-Audio

- 원격 블루투스 오디오
- remote bluetooth audio


### Dev
```bash
$ git clone ...
$ pdm venv create
$ source .venv/bin/activate
$ pdm install
$ pytest
```



# use
```bash
$ pip install RMT-Audio OR pdm add Remote
$ python
>>> from rmt_audio.remote import remote
>>> remote(1,2,3)
'Not Yet, Wait a minute, sir!'
```
